thread.title: Luton Airport has busiest summer on record
thread.title_full: Luton Airport has busiest summer on record | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Luton Airport has busiest summer on record
text:
2.6m passengers passed through Luton Airport in July and August Credit: ITV News Anglia Luton Airport has had its busiest summer on record. More than two and a half million passengers travelled through the airport in July and August.
It was used by 1.4 million passengers in August alone, a 16% rise on the same period in 2014.
The airport is also investing £100m to increase its annual capacity from 12 million to 18 million by 2026.
“This record-breaking summer has demonstrated the increasing popularity of London Luton Airport and has highlighted the need for expansion in order to meet the demands of our passengers.
"The £100m we are investing will ensure that we are able to give all our passengers a quick, easy and good value service at London Luton.”
– Nick Barton, CEO of London Luton Airport Last updated Fri 11 Sep 2015 Travel Luton Airport Luton Bedfordshire
